Coming from someone who's had it before. It is rather concerning. Often times it was a bit uncomfortable to breath. But treat it as you would any other illness. Lots of rest and water. Increase vitamin intake as well. Eat lot of immune system boosting foods. Acetaminophen is helpful to maintain the coughs. I was very scared when I tested positive especially since I have asthma but just use common sense and fight it off you would any viral infection. I've since come back negative and am very grateful things didn't take a nasty turn. If you start feeling a scratchy, dry, mildly burning sensation in the back of your sinuses when you take a deep breath it's a good idea to get tested. It was a big tell for me.
